channel.title: Hair on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hair on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Korea’s No. 1 Scalp Care and Hair Growth Brand Earned the Approval of Dakota Johnson’s Hairstylist
item.description: Star hairstylist Mark Townsend — who also works with Parker Posey, Aubrey Plaza, Riley Keough, Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen and others — is a fan of Dr. Groot’s thickening shampoos and conditioners.
